titles: Abuses discovered, whereby the creditors are meerly cheated the officers of law, and goalers are unjustly inriched, and the poor debter and their families tyrannically destroyed.
author: Gery, William.
notes: Signed at end. W.G. [i.e. William Gery].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Debt, Imprisonment for --  England --  Early works to 1800.
